comment.author: Eric
comment.text: PEOPLE STAY FOCUS. KEEP YOUR EYES ON THE PRIZE. VOTE HILARY CLINTON FOR PRESIDENT

replies.author: Devon
replies.text: feel like to throw up when i see people supporting Hilary for president. She is the most corrupted politician. This is a trap of nature. Nature will never let us to get rid of corruption, poverty, crime etc. Nature will pick hilary to keep our poverty , crime and corruption intact. Nature needs people like you to support it

replies.author: Eric
replies.text: MOSTLY ALL REPUBLICANS ARE COWARDS. THEY PLOT BEHIND CLOSED DOORS. NEVER FOR OUR BENEFIT. BUT FOR THEIRS. THEY'LL STOP AT NOTHING TO NOT CONFIRM A QUALIFIED CANDIDATE TO THE SUPREME COURT. BECAUSE IT'S NOT THEIR CHOICE. THEY CHOOSE TRUMP AS A CANDIDATE AND COULDN'T CONTROL HIM. THEY THEN DENOUNCE HIM AND THEN VOTED FOR HIM. WE NEED TO CLEAN HOUSE. GET RID OF THIS RIFF RAFT AND START A NEW.

replies.author: Devon
replies.text: Trump has potential to make each American family millionaire family. Look community organizer Obama who didn't even have $ 1000 before he became politician. African American living standard went down big time during Obama administration.
